animeDescription: Wataru is a young man who moves into an apartment next to Tomoka and Fumie Fusono, two voluptuous sisters who used to know him when he was a shy child. Now Wataru is all grown up, and the Fusono sisters are ready to take full advantage of that fact.(Source: ANN)
animeStaff: [['Raika, Ken', 'Director'], ['Nakagawa, Tatsuto', 'Sound Director'], ['Sakisaka, Mamoru', 'Storyboard, Key Animation'], ['Tatsunami, Youtoku', 'Original Character Design']]
